meanings.definition: Add color to (a black and white photograph)
meanings.sent1: I will colorize this old photo to make it look more vibrant.
meanings.sent2: She used a special software to colorize the black and white image.
meanings.sent3: The artist accidentally colorized the wrong part of the picture, making it look funny.
meanings.sent4: His memories were colorized with happiness, like a rainbow after a storm.
meanings.sent5: The painter's brush strokes skillfully colorized the canvas, bringing it to life.
